name: UW GameDevClub SPOOKY Pack
description:
A bundle of SPOOKY games from the University of Washington Game Development Club! We've been working hard to make a lot of games this quarter, and we made a lot of games in our spooky themed game jam a few weeks ago. Donate five dollars (or more!) to gain access to all of the games below.

100% of your donation goes toward the club, so we can run more game jams, showcases, and other events that help empower developers at the university to make great games.

Thanks so much for your support!
